children.value: What are dropdown navigations? They look something similar to a box of options hanging down from the Navigation Bar. Something similar to the illustration given below.
The first and foremost step to build accessible components is to start using
. So let us break down each of the components of the navigation.

• The first step to start building the navigation is use the semantic ```nav``` tag
  • Navigation schema is composed of a list of links and should be provided as nested lists of links
  • Attach aria attributes to the navigation for the assisstive information when using screen readers
